SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents a game. It is identified by a unique id. Each game has some players (from 2 to 4), a board, 12 common goal cards and 12 personal goal cards.

    • id

      public int id

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(List<Player> players, gameController controller)
      Creates a game given a list of players. It initializes the board for the first time. It picks the first player and give randomically each player a personal goal card. It randomically choose two common goal cards.
      Parameters:
      players - list of players participating in the game.
      controller - instance of gameController that interacts with the server.

  • Method Details

    • reconnectPlayer

      public void reconnectPlayer(String player) throws RemoteException
      It manages the reconnection to the game of a player that has previously disconnected.
      Parameters:
      player - nickname of the player that is reconnecting.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws RemoteException, InterruptedException
      Manages all the game logic from start to end. It calculates the total points of each player at the end of every turn.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
      InterruptedException

    • pickTiles

      public List<Tile> pickTiles(Player p) throws RemoteException
      Handles the action "pick tiles".
      Parameters:
      p - the current player.
      Returns:
      list of chosen tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • checkTiles

      public boolean checkTiles(List<Tile> chosen)
      Checks if the tiles are all the same.
      Parameters:
      chosen - the tiles to be checked.
      Returns:
      true only if the tiles are all the same, false otherwise.

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • calculateWinner

      public Player calculateWinner()
      Returns the winner of the game. The player who scored most points wins the game. In case of a tie, the player sitting further from the first one wins the game.

    • calculateCC

      public void calculateCC(Player p) throws RemoteException
      It checks if the given player has completed one of the common goal of the game.
      Parameters:
      p - given player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
